Title: The Bris
Plot: George gets a great parking spot that becomes a target. Kramer thinks that he has stumbled on the product of a genetic engineering experiment, a "pig man." Elaine and Jerry are nervous about the religious duties they must do when they agree to become godparents to a couple's newborn, including getting the Mohel and holding the baby for the circumcision.
GuestStars: Charles Levin, Debra Mooney, Tom Alan Robbins, Jeannie Elias, John Gegenhuber, Tia Riebling, Frank Noon
